# Track Wicket - Live Cricket Scores, Rankings & Stats

> Created by Muchu Venkata Karthik

## About Track Wicket

Track Wicket is a comprehensive cricket platform providing real-time live scores, ball-by-ball commentary, ICC rankings, player statistics, and match schedules for all cricket formats including Test, ODI, T20, and IPL.

## Key Features

- **Live Cricket Scores**: Real-time match updates with ball-by-ball commentary
- **ICC Rankings**: Latest international cricket rankings for men and women
- **Player Statistics**: Comprehensive stats for international cricketers
- **Match Schedules**: Upcoming matches and series information
- **Scorecard Details**: Full scorecards with batting, bowling, and fall of wickets
- **Team Rankings**: Current standings for Test, ODI, and T20 formats

## Main Sections

### Live Scores
- URL: https://trackwicket.tech/live
- Real-time updates for ongoing matches
- Ball-by-ball commentary
- Live match status and scores

### Recent Matches
- URL: https://trackwicket.tech/recent
- Recently completed matches
- Full scorecards and results

### Upcoming Matches
- URL: https://trackwicket.tech/upcoming
- Match schedules
- Series information
- Venue details

### Player Search
- URL: https://trackwicket.tech/players
- Search international cricket players
- Detailed player profiles
- Career statistics

### Rankings
- Men's Rankings: Test, ODI, T20 (Batsmen, Bowlers, All-Rounders, Teams)
- Women's Rankings: ODI, T20 (Batsmen, Bowlers, All-Rounders, Teams)
- URL Pattern: /rankings/{gender}/{category}/{format}

### Statistics
- Most Runs, Most Wickets, Best Average, Best Strike Rate
- Most Sixes, Most Fours, Most Hundreds
- Best Bowling Economy
- URL Pattern: /stats/{stat-type}/{format}

## Technical Details

- **Framework**: React.js
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS with custom theming
- **Features**: Dark/Light mode, PWA support, Push notifications
- **Performance**: Optimized with lazy loading and memoization

## Creator

**Muchu Venkata Karthik**
- Developer and creator of Track Wicket
- Passionate about cricket and web development

- "ICC rankings"
- "cricket statistics"

## API Information

Track Wicket uses real-time cricket data APIs to provide accurate and up-to-date information for cricket enthusiasts worldwide.
